question: Most farmers use fertilizers on their cornfields. Which statement best explains why farmers should not use excess amounts of fertilizers?
candidate_answers: (A) Fertilizers may wash into streams. (B) Fertilizers may be used by weeds. (C) Fertilizers may evaporate into the air. (D) Fertilizers may come from natural materials.
answer: Fertilizers may evaporate into the air.
label: C
